title: Dead Beyond the Fence
description: The dead have risen, and there's no safe place. Coworkers Kevin and Angel take refuge in a college town research facility, where a handful of desperate survivors battle the plague and each other while searching for a cure. Meanwhile, Angel has a secret that will affect everyone in the facility. "Dead Beyond the Fence" includes a bonus novella, "Dread Appetites." Seven months have passed, and the dead still walk. Will the world ever return to normal?
author: Brian  Kaufman
